question: Maternity leave of how many weeks is available to mothers adopting a child below the age of three months from the date of adoption under Maternity Benefit Amendment Act?
explanation: Maternity leave of 12 weeks to be available to mothers adopting a child below the age of three months from the date of adoption as well as to the “commissioning mothers” according to the  Maternity Benefit (Amendment) Act, 2017.
